```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Import original TESS data

```{r}
tess = read_csv("datasets/tess.csv", skip = 69)
```

# Random sample of TESS data

```{r}
set.seed(42)
tess_sample = tess[sample(nrow(tess), 250), ]
```

# Give noise to sample

```{r}
set.seed(42)
tess_sample = tess_sample %>% 
  mutate(pl_eqt = pl_eqt + rnorm(n(), mean = 0, sd = 40),
         st_rad = st_rad * (1 + rnorm(n(), mean = 0, sd = 0.01)),
         pl_trandep = pl_trandep * (1 + rnorm(n(), mean = 0, sd = 0.01)),
         pl_rade = pl_rade + rnorm(n(), mean = 0, sd = 0.01),
         pl_orbper = pl_orbper * (1 + rnorm(n(), mean = 0, sd = 10)))
```

# Export to csv

```{r}
write_csv(tess_sample, "datasets/tess_sample.csv")
```
